title: The agreement and registration of the tenements as per the allotment order shall be carried out by the developer in favor of individual Protected Occupier
clause_text: The agreement and registration of the tenements as per the allotment order shall be carried out by the developer in favor of individual Protected Occupier.
section: ALLOTMENT OF THE TENEMENTS TO THE PROTECTED OCCUPIERS
